price: sujétenlo con una cadena de setenta codos,
arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma fī sil'silatin dharʿuhā sabʿūna dhirāʿan fa-us'lukūhu
